entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle late in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
